column4: hey how do I turn on 3dnow and sse in my atholon, for some reason its not enabled
anyone?
look in the flags of /proc/cpuinfo
same thing. You need 'mplayer-k7', not 'mplayer-custom'.
warty or hoary?
usb?
he has Dapper mixed in there somehow
hmm thats twice that someone has complained
that's because no one tests when I ask them to.
sign me up for your list
I'll test
there's an open invitation for our git tree.  Do tests daily.
I thought the last update was just a abi version change or something
linux-image-foo contains snd-usb-audio.ko, however.
can I bug you for a quick sec?
sure, but I may not answer immediately.
do you know which package has snd_usb_audio
linux-image-foo
actually, to be pedantic, none.
note that modprobe does not discriminate between hyphens and underscores used in module names.
hehe gotcha thanks
for whatever reason the friend you helped yesterday does not have that module
he wouldn't have snd_usb_audio.ko or snd_usb_audio, no.  He would have a snd-usb-audio.ko, however.
:D right thanks
